      static int getHealth()
      getHealth = returns player health.

      getHero = Returns what random hero is picked for the Enemy player.

      getMana = returns the mana(energy to place cards) of the player.

      setHealth = sets the health of the player(can be used from another class)

      • setHealth

        public static void setHealth(int hp)
        setHealth = sets the health of the player(can be used from another class)

      • setMana

        public static void setMana(int ma)
        setMana = sets the mana(energy to place cards) of the Enemy. The first if is to check if the mana is above 40 and if it is, change it to 40.

      • getHealth

        public static int getHealth()
        getHealth = returns player health.

        getMana = returns the mana(energy to place cards) of the player.
